overview_of_class: Introduction to the fundamentals of heat transfer by conduction, convection and radiation. Derivation of the diffusion equation. Steady one-dimensional conduction. Steady multi-dimensional conduction. Conduction from fins. Unsteady conduction. Lumped capacitance method. Conservation equations. Convective heat transfer-internal flows. Convective heat transfer-external flows. Free convection.
name: Heat Transfer I
subject: MECH_ENG
